channel.title: Running my server, error is it fixible?
channel.description:
when i run my server i click compiler.bat close the window then runserver and minimize the server but they have error's on them and i cant get on my testscape server, i have download JDk6u1.
What should i do?
Error 1 (compiler) these are the error's 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Error 2 (runserver) Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Running my server, error is it fixible?
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Compile.bat --> Edit Put this in:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin/java.exe” server
pause

Then Edit --> Runserver.bat and put this:

@color 1f
title Server compiler
echo Starting “YOURSERVERNAMEHERE”
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe” server
pause

Save, Compile and Run If you have to, you can even delete the “classpath” variable, as it is not required.

Hope this helps!

Read full topic
item.source: Running my server, error is it fixible?
